评论详情: I am absolutely in love with these LIVHO Trendy Polarized Oval Aviator Sunglasses! The oversized frame gives them such a chic, fashion-forward look, and I’ve received so many compliments every time I wear them. The polarized lenses are fantastic—no more squinting in the sun or dealing with glare. They provide great UV protection, which is a must for protecting my eyes, especially during long days outdoors.  The retro design is perfect for both casual and dressy outfits, making these sunglasses a versatile accessory. The fit is comfortable, and I love how they stay securely in place without feeling too tight. The quality of the materials feels premium, and the lenses are clear and provide great visibility.  Overall, these sunglasses are an amazing mix of style and function, and they’ve quickly become my go-to pair. Whether you’re looking for something trendy or just want reliable sun protection, these are perfect. Highly recommend!

评论详情: Very attractive and lightweight polarized aviators. Plastic, not metal, so you don’t have to worry about arms or frames warping. Nice and unisex!

类型: Color: Tortoise Gradient Brown/BrownLens Color: Polarized
评论详情: Received these in tortoise shell with brown lenses. Nicely enough made and fit fine. Two things to note: the lenses are lightly tinted so these are better for shaded areas or overcast days, depending on your light sensitivity (I personally need darker lenses). Also, at least in my pair, there there is a band of clear plastic at the bottom below each lens (in the frame) that gets bright in sunlight and is pretty distracting. All that said, nothing wrong with them, just things to know.

类型: Color: Clear Brown/Green Gradient BrownLens Color: Polarized
评论详情: These sunglasses feel comfortable and lightweight. I was worried at first that they were going to break due to how light they felt in my hands but I quickly discovered how durable they are. I was drawn to these because of being unisex. When in the car it always seems like either my wife or I forgot our pair of sunglasses, it's been nice that we have an extra pair that we can both utilize. The lens are not as dark as most sunglasses I have been used to wearing in the past , but I don't think that's a bad thing. These retro vibes are beginning to be my go to! Highly recommend.

类型: Color: Dark Brown/Gradient BrownLens Color: Polarized
评论详情: Cute fits well and very lightweight. Great sunglasses.

类型: Color: Light Black Tortoise/PurpleLens Color: Polarized
评论详情: I was a little nervous after I ordered these because I hadn't remembered to check for my one non-optional feature, the molded nosepiece that lets me push my sunglasses up on my head if I need to without getting tangled in my hair. Not to worry, I was relieved to find when they arrived that they have it. They are comfortable and lightweight. The earpieces fit my head well and my head is on the larger side so it may not work so well for those with smaller heads. They have polarized lenses and I can see clearly. They came with a basic little bag and lens cloth. With the lightweight plastic arms, time will only tell how well they will hold up regular use. Overall I am pleased and they will be my go to driving sunglasses for now.

评论详情: These sunglasses are oversized but still very lightweight. They come in a variety of colors, both frame and lenses, and look nice. The lenses are not as dark as some sunglasses, which I think is a good thing because I tend to walk in the evening and dark sunglasses make it too dark. Also, because the lenses are not too dark, I can read my watch (I keep track of distance when I walk) with no problems' The only negative, and the reason for 4 stars rather than 5, is that I find the temples a bit too short (maybe 1/4 inch). They still fit me but would be more comfortable with an additional 1/4 inch.

类型: Color: Dark Brown/Gradient BrownLens Color: Polarized
评论详情: I am unsure of the exact definition of “100% polarized,” but I can confirm that these sunglasses are definitely polarized.  However, when we compare them to the leading brands and their polarized sunglasses, these sunglasses do not quite measure up to a 100% match. Their fall can be observed to range from 70 percent to 80 percent in terms of quality polarization.  These sunglasses not only fit perfectly on my face, but they also feel incredibly lightweight and have a subtle, beautiful design.  With a price point of under $20 and packaging that included a pouch and a cleaning cloth, these sunglasses deserve nothing less than a 5-star rating.
